law.text: No person shall sell, offer for sale, give away, deal in or supply, or have in his possession for that purpose, any denatured alcohol that contains methyl or wood alcohol, unless the container bears the following conspicuously printed, stenciled or typewritten notice: "Skull and crossbones -- Poison -- Denatured alcohol -- Warning. This fluid contains wood alcohol, and if inhaled or swallowed may cause blindness or death. It is unlawful to use this fluid in any way either internally or externally for the human body."
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2635b-3.
